DeviceName.description: Name of the device of the diagnostic data.

items.title: AccessResult
items.description: Result values of an AutoID Identifier access.

CodeType.description: Defines the format of Identifier as string.

Identifier.title: ScanData
Identifier.description: The AutoID Identifier (e.g. a code or a transponder) which was accessed by a command.

Custom.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.

Timestamp.description: The point of time the AutoID Identifier was accessed by the command.

Client.description: Client which was the originator of the command.

items.title: RfidAccessResult
items.description: Additional result values of an Rfid Transponder access.

CodeTypeRWData.description: Defines the format of RWData as string.

RWData.title: ScanData
RWData.description: The user data which was written to / was read from the Rfid Transponder by the command.

Custom.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.

Antenna.description: The antenna by which the transponder was accessed by the command.

CurrentPowerLevel.description: The power level with which the transponder was accessed by the command.

PC.description: The Protocol Control Word of the transponder accessed by the command.

Polarization.description: The polarization with which the last transponder was accessed by the command.

Strength.description: The Rssi value with which the transponder was accessed by the command.

CodeType.description: Defines the format of the ScanData as string.

ScanData.title: ScanData
ScanData.description: Holds the information about the detected objects e.g. the detected transponders.

Custom.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.

Location.title: Location
Location.description: Returns the location of the object detection.

ImageId.description: NodeId of the original scan image file object used for this scan result.

Quality.description: Returns the probability of correct decoding.

Position.title: Position
Position.description: Returns the position of the text within the image.

Font.description: Returns the font name used for decoding.

Grade.description: Returns the quality of the 1D/2D code.

Position.title: Position
Position.description: Returns the position of the text within the image.

Sighting.description: Returns additional information on the RFID-related properties of the scan event.

Antenna.description: Returns the number of the antenna which detects the RFID tag first.

Strength.description: Returns the signal strength (RSSI) of the transponder. Higher values indicate a better strength.

CurrentPowerLevel.description: Returns the current power level (unit according to parameter settings).

MISC_ERROR_TOTAL.description: The operation has not be executed in total.

MISC_ERROR_PARTIAL.description: The operation has been executed only partial.

REGION_NOT_FOUND_ERROR.description: Memory region not available for the actual tag.

OP_NOT_POSSIBLE_ERROR.description: Operation not supported by the actual tag.

OUT_OF_RANGE_ERROR.description: Addressed memory not available for the actual tag.

NO_IDENTIFIER.description: The operation cannot be executed because no tag or code was inside the range of the AutoID Device or the tag or code has been moved out of the range during execution.

MULTIPLE_IDENTIFIERS.description: Multiple tags or codes have been selected, but the command can only be used with a single tag or code.

READ_ERROR.description: The tag or code exists and has a valid format, but there was a problem reading the data (e.g. still CRC error after maximum number of retries).

DECODING_ERROR.description: The (optical) code or plain text has too many failures and cannot be detected.

MATCH_ERROR.description: The code doesnâ€™t match the given target value.

CODE_NOT_SUPPORTED.description: The code format is not supported by the AutoID Device.

WRITE_ERROR.description: The tag exists, but there was a problem writing the data.

NOT_SUPPORTED_BY_DEVICE.description: The command or a parameter combination is not supported by the AutoID Device.

NOT_SUPPORTED_BY_TAG.description: The command or a parameter combination is not supported by the tag.

DEVICE_NOT_READY.description: The AutoID Device is in a state not ready to execute the command.

INVALID_CONFIGURATION.description: The AutoID Device configuration is not valid.

RF_COMMUNICATION_ERROR.description: This error indicates that there is a general error in the communication between the transponder and the reader.

DEVICE_FAULT.description: The AutoID Device has a hardware fault.

TAG_HAS_LOW_BATTERY.description: The battery of the (active) tag is low.

Location.title: Location
Location.description: Union of GPS, UTM or Local

CodeType.description: Defines the format of the ScanData as string.

ScanData.title: ScanData
ScanData.description: Holds the information about the detected objects e.g. the detected transponders.

Custom.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.

Location.title: Location
Location.description: Returns the location of the object detection.

DeviceLocationName.description: Symbolic name of the device location.

DeviceName.description: Default could be also host name, IP address or MAC. This should be a field that can be configured for a device.

LastScanTimestamp.description: Point of time the last AutoID Identifier was scanned.

data.description: Point of time the last AutoID Identifier was scanned.
